---
title: "Manage model inventory custom fields"
date: last-modified
---

Manage custom fields that will appear in all models in the model inventory 

## Prerequisites

* You are a Customer Admin or Developer.

## Steps

1. [Log in to the ValidMind UI]({{< var vm_url >}}).

2. Click **Settings** on the left sidebar.

3. Click **Custom Fields** under **Workspace Settings**

4. To add a new field, **+ Add new field**
